rows.label: qst100701_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Have question!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0002
rows.name:
Is true that Pyrithium Trade
Guild more bigger and famouser
than Avaritia Trade Guild?!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0003
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo! Why nobody hear
of Pyrithium Trade Guild?!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0004
rows.name:
Pyrithium Trade Guild one of
eleven Nopon trade guilds.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0005
rows.name:
Nuinui is rising star in ranks
of Pyrithium Trade Guild!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0006
rows.name:
But ever since Avaritia rise
to power, all other Nopon
guilds get left behind...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0007
rows.name:
So, to restore Pyrithium
Trade Guild to former glory,
last wish of Nuinui...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0009
rows.name:
Open this chest that pass down
through generations, then sell
treasure and put guild back on feet!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0010
rows.name: But Nuinui need Nopon Doubloo- Hold up!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0011
rows.name:
Smell of Nopon Doubloon! Come from
pocket of friend! Show to Nuinui!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0012
rows.name:
T-this! This it! Nopon
Doubloon of legend!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0013
rows.name:
This key for accessing fabled treasure
trove of Pyrithium Trade Guild!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0014
rows.name:
Number of Nopon Doubloons in world
equal to number of trade guilds...
Eleven in total, Nopon say.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0015
rows.name:
But to make chest opening not so
easy, they hidden all over Alst.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0016
rows.name:
If friends can open treasure, Nuinui
share with friends...a little. So please,
friends bring eleven Nopon Doubloons!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0017
rows.name:
Heheh, Nuinui lucky to find
such greedy, greedy friends!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0018
rows.name:
Ah, Nuinui not mean in bad way!
In Pyrithium Trade Guild, call
friend "greedy" is highest praise!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0019
rows.name:
Whereabouts of Nopon Doubloon?
Nuinui know just one. Happy day!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0020
rows.name:
Friends go to Avaritia Trade Guild,
find stacked boxes in Central
Exchange. Doubloon on very top!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0021
rows.name:
Nuinui not skilled jumper,
cannot reach on Nuinui's own...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0022
rows.name:
Friends go collect that
one, and all others, until
friends have eleven!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0101
rows.name:
In Central Exchange area of Avaritia
Trade Guild, is lots of stacked crates.
One Doubloon found on top there!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0102
rows.name:
There are eleven Nopon Doubloons
in total! Friends gather every
last one and come back here, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0103
rows.name:
Until then, Nuinui take
deep dive into business
wisdom of Chairman Bahn.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0104
rows.name: What is saying? "Know thy competitor"?
